articles.content:
Greetings to President of Benin 
    Pyongyang, July 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Mathieu Kerekou, President of Benin, on July 28 on the occasion of the 43rd anniversary of its independence.
 Wishing the president and the government of Benin great success in their work for peace and prosperity of the country, the message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields.
